article.headline: Alabama 91, Nicholls St. 53
article.story: TUSCALOOSA, Ala. (AP) -- Mykal Riley scored 22 points and hit 6-of-8 3-pointers to lead five double-digit scorers in Alabama's 91-53 victory Saturday over Nicholls State. Alonzo Gee added 20 points and 12 rebounds for the Crimson Tide (5-3), which held a commanding 46-22 rebounding advantage. Alabama took control with an early 20-2 run during an eight-minute spurt when Nicholls State (2-7) went 0-for-9 from the floor. Brandon Hollinger scored 14 points and had nine assists off the bench for the Tide. Rico Pickett had 12 points and six assists and Demetrius Jemison scored 10 for the Tide. Led by Riley, Alabama made 13 of 20 3-pointers. Gee made 8-of-12 shots and had four steals in just 26 minutes. 'Bama had assists on 25 of 34 baskets. The Tide's 51-19 halftime lead allowed coach Mark Gottfried to use the rare easy win to get his reserves plenty of action. Nine players scored and only Pickett played 30 minutes. It was Alabama's first double-digit victory since a 12-point win over Troy in the opener. Leading scorer Richard Hendrix played only 17 minutes, finishing with five points and six rebounds. Nicholls State, which fell to 1-25 alltime against Southeastern Conference teams, was led by Dominic Friend's 11 points. Michael Czepil had nine points. The undersized Colonels had to rely heavily on 3-pointers, most of which weren't falling. Nicholls State was 6-of-24 from long range. Alabama was playing without freshman guard Senario Hillman, who missed the game to attend his grandfather's funeral.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
